> Umm.. Not from the stats that I know. Raksha's site even has a 
pretty 
> good set up of sizes. Megatron himself is 39 feet in height. 
> BMs are half the size of Gen 1.
> I'm trying to get Maxima to revert back to her Gen 1 style. 

Uh, yeah, but in any event, rules are rules.  She can get her style 
back, but without council permission no can do on the size thing.
> 
> 
> IC:
>  
> > "Okay, here goes ..."  Wheeljack reaches over and sedates her, 
then 
> > starts to work.  Installing new parts is generally time-
consuming, 
> > but the Autobot makes relatively short work of it.  After a few 
> hours 
> > of welding, digging, and installing the necessary subroutines for 
> the 
> > transformation to work, he feels his patient is ready to face the 
> > world, and reactivates her.  "There you are.  How do you feel?"
> 
> Her optics flutter & glow as she awakens. Then sits up. She didn't 
> notice much difference. Wishing that she could run the quick 
> diagnostics that she once was able to do. But she did the best she 
> could, flexing & lookign herself over. 
> 
> "Feels good," as she slid off the 'table'. "I thank you. Now... you 
> are still going to rebuilt my old form, correct?"

"Right."  He gives her the thumbs-up.  "Like I said, it'll take a few 
days - longer if Hydras or the Tripreds make trouble.  But I'll do 
the best I can."
